channel.title: Npm on Alex T.
channel.description: Recent content in Npm on Alex T.

item.title: A mininal Hugo blogging workflow
item.description: Hugo is a blazingly fast static site generator based on Go. My first experience with Hugo was truly pleasant. I appreciate the separation of contents, presentations, and site generation logics in Hugo that leads to less effort for maintenance or switching themes.

item.title: Node.js package managers: NPM and Yarn
item.description: Node.js is an increasingly popular and widely used JavaScript runtime nowadays. One of the important aspects of Node.js is to manage the dependencies among software artefacts. Better dependency management would advocate modularisation and decoupling of software components.
